meanings.definition: A decorative jewelry item worn on clothing
meanings.sent1: She wore beautiful brooches on her dresses.
meanings.sent2: The brooches added a touch of elegance to her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The brooches on her coat seemed to sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of brooches was like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The antique brooches gleamed with history and charm.

meanings.definition: To fasten or decorate with a brooch
meanings.sent1: She carefully brooches her scarf in place.
meanings.sent2: He brooches his cloak with a family heirloom.
meanings.sent3: The magician brooches the cape with a flourish of his wand.
meanings.sent4: She brooches her shawl as if sealing a secret.
meanings.sent5: The artist brooches the fabric with precision and care.
